Angle Potentials

Detailed Description

template<class Interaction>
class DdMd::AnglePotentialImpl< Interaction >

Implementation template for a AnglePotential.

Definition at line 206 of file ddMd/potentials/angle/AnglePotentialImpl.h.

template<class Interaction >
void DdMd::AnglePotentialImpl< Interaction >::readParam ( std::istream &  in) [virtual]

Read potential energy parameters.

This method reads the angle potential Interaction parameter block. Before calling Interaction::readParam(), it passes simulation().nAngleType() to Interaction::setNAtomType().

Reimplemented from Util::ParamComposite.

Returns forces along two bonds at the angle, for use in MD and stress calculation.

Parameters:
